attributes.action: ban bonuses at RBS for year ended 31 DEC 08
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please protect the tax payer and small UK pension holders from the greed of RBS senior management. Time to end the disgraceful lie that they somehow deserve any additional bonuses on top of their already high basic salaries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
